usx.para: This is the list of the ancestors of Jesus Christ, a descendant of David, who was a descendant of Abraham.

From Abraham to King David, the following ancestors are listed: Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, Judah and his brothers; then Perez and Zerah (their mother was Tamar 1.2-6a: Tamar: Bore her twin sons out of wedlock (Gen 38.6-30).), Hezron, Ram, Amminadab, Nahshon, Salmon, Boaz (his mother was Rahab 1.2-6a: Rahab: A prostitute in Jericho (Josh 2.1-21; 6.17-25; Jas 2.25).), Obed (his mother was Ruth1.2-6a: Ruth: A Moabite (Ruth 1.4). Only outstanding women were normally included in Jewish genealogical lists.), Jesse, and King David.

From David to the time when the people of Israel were taken into exile in Babylon1.6b-11: exile in Babylon: In 597 BC King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylonia conquered Jerusalem and took many of its inhabitants as prisoners to his country (2 Kgs 24.10-16; 2 Chr 36.9-10)., the following ancestors are listed: ...
